document.heading: Sex Offender Registration Temporary Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-287, the “Sex Offender Registration Temporary Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-646. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 5, 1998, and June 2, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor, it was assigned Act No. 12-386 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-287 became effective on June 18, 1999.
